title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-28] [$250] Task - Checkmark box is higher then the task title if font size is larger
issue_repo_steps:

2. Log in
3. Open any chat
4. Create a task without assignee

Expected result: Checkmark box is on the same level as the task title if font size is larger

Actual result: None
